name: tbtabby
text: Can you tell Cornelius was still developing as a character? Nowadays, he'd have the decency to wait until he was out of the room before dislodging the wedgie.

name: edjarosu
text:
Yeah, that was my thought exactly.

First three panels: "Hey, Mr. Bear's speech patterns are now closer to what they eventually became."

Last three panels: "Something just doesn't seem quite right here."

name: tortoisesandbox
text: I thought it was intentional, to get Teodor's mind off of his lady love.

name: drskradley
text: First old strip to give me chuckles.  Not counting the first, of course.  Good to see the characters and storylines evolve.

name: snowman
text:
Oh, Cornelius picking a wedgie. It is to LOL.

This arc got funnier and funnier. 5.
